name: The Fumbling Wizard
description:
Developed as part of Ludum Dare 50, the theme being "Delay the Inevitable"

This game was made by me and WitchGF.

https://witchgf.itch.io/

In The Fumbling Wizard, you have 90 seconds before an asteroid collides with the planet and kills everyone, it's up to you; a newly qualified wizard, to put a stop to it. But that is not such an easy task... as whoever wrote your spellbook wrote it with no disregard for order!

The Mac and Linux installs may not work, as neither of us have these OS's so it's impossible to test, but if they do, yay!
